channel.title: [Pi] Interface [Pi]
channel.description: Hello everybody, I just added Ancient Curses to my server and I was wondering how I can make it so that whenever I click a lunar altar, that it will switch my prayers to curses, can anybody please explain to me how to do that?

item.title: [Pi] Interface [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Have your Object First-Click Packet set your Sidebar Magic Tab to the Interface I.D. for Curses.

Example:

     case 132: // Object Clicking *1st Click*
          if (objectID == 1734) {
              doAction();
          }
     break;

Read full topic
